<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns a pair with first element representing whether basic block sections</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// profile exist for the function \\p FuncName, and the second element</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// representing the basic block sections profile (cluster info) for this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function. If the first element is true and the second element is empty, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// means unique basic block sections are desired for all basic blocks of the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// function.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;bool, SmallVector&lt;BBClusterInfo&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For every function name, it contains the cloning and cluster information</span></CodeLine>
